Temperature sensitive kittens
Monster Rancher Metropolis: Monster Rancher 1 Archive (PSOne): Miscellaneous Q&A (Post New Questions Here): Temperature sensitive kittens
By Meister Lich on Friday, May 11, 2007 - 06:58 am:

Sorry, if this is already known, but I just discovered something that appears to be a (minor) bug of MR1. When breeding a Nya by using the cat doll, you'll get a bonus of +5 on skill and speed. However, this bonus will be lost, if you freeze the offspring right after the combination.

By Anonymous on Friday, June 1, 2007 - 07:17 pm:

I never knew of this, personally. Thanks for shedding light on it. It does seem rather strange that this would happen...
